ModMetaData.name: Rimedieval - Medieval Royalty
ModMetaData.author: Ogam,Taranchuk
ModMetaData.description:
Replaces the equipment of the Empire's pawnkinds from the Royalty DLC. Best to play alond with Rimedieval - Medieval Conversion mod. Adds new Byzantine inspired armors and weapons:
- Footman Armor - Scout Armor - Varangian Armor
- Imperial Sabre - Varangian Axe - Firepot Bomb - Firethrower
Credits: Code: C# - Taranchuk Art: Ogam
